room.name: OutsideEntryway
room.description: You are standing outside a door in a hallway.

room.name: Entryway
room.description: The entryway is bright and pleasant. The floor is tile. There is a closet ahead and to the left a bookshelf.

room.name: Kitchen
room.description: The kitchen is clean and bright. There is a stove, a sink, a refridgerator, and a pantry.

room.name: Laundry
room.description: The laundry room is quiet. There is a hamper, a clothes washer, and a clothes dryer.

room.name: Garage
room.description: The garage is packed with stuff all along the walls.

room.name: OutsideGarage
room.description: You are standing outside the garage. There is a keypad on the wall.

room.name: DiningRoom
room.description: The dining room has a painting on one wall, a table with places for four people, and a large bookcase.

room.name: LivingRoom
room.description: The living room has a couch, chairs, a coffee table, and media center with a TV.

room.name: MasterBedroom
room.description: The master bedroom has a bookcase, a bed, a closet, a bookshelf, a dresser, and a computer desk.

room.name: MasterBathroom
room.description: The master bathroom is clean. It has a toilet, sink, shower, and garbage can.

room.name: Hallway
room.description: The hallway is mostly empty except for a rug and doorways.

room.name: Bedroom1
room.description: This bed room has a closet, a bed, a dresser, and a computer desk.

room.name: Bedroom2
room.description: This bed room has a closet, a bed, a dresser, and a computer desk.

room.name: Bathroom
room.description: The bathroom is clean. It has a toilet, sink, tub with a shower, and garbage can.
